ModMetaData.name: No Selector Limit
ModMetaData.author: Craig
ModMetaData.description:
Removes the arbitrary limit of 200 objects when selecting multiple objects on the map.
Sometimes called the ultimate chicken selector!
Please note: The way this patch works should be future proofed, it has survived without any changes since v1.2 The only way for this mod to break is if they change 1 very specific method in the game which hasn't been touched in years.
